Contact Us

Scotch Panels

HTML Example

You can put whatever you want in the panel.

                
                $('#scotch-panel').scotchPanel({

                    type: 'html', // This is default anyways

                    containerSelector: 'body',
                    direction: 'top',
                    duration: 300,
                    transition: 'ease',
                    clickSelector: '.toggle-panel',
                    enableEscapeKey: true
                });
